meanings.definition: Depleted or exhausted beyond the available balance in a bank account.
meanings.sent1: Her overdrawn account caused her to incur fees.
meanings.sent2: The bank notified him of his overdrawn balance.
meanings.sent3: His overdrawn account made him wish he had saved more money.
meanings.sent4: The overdrawn account was a bottomless pit of debt.
meanings.sent5: The overdrawn balance was a financial disaster waiting to happen.
